name: Bosch Unlimited 7 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with Rechargeable 3.0 Ah Battery and FlexTube, LED Lighting, 10-Year Motor Warranty, in Graphite
description:
As powerful as a corded vacuum: The TurboSpin motor provides high-efficiency cleaning with up to 66,000 rpm, and the motorized brush ensures outstanding performance on hard floors, carpets, and car upholstery.
Flexible: Bosch appliances have convenient features that make cleaning your home both quick and easy.
FlexTube: Vacuuming underneath the couch or other low furniture is easier than ever, thanks to the Bosch FlexTube that's included with the Unlimited 7.
Nozzle foot release: Easily detach the nozzle with your foot to switch from vacuuming the floor to cleaning in high-up or narrow places.
Lightweight, handheld: While cleaning with the handheld nozzle, both the tube and the nozzle stand up by themselves, saving you time and energy when vacuuming.
Clean your entire home with one battery charge: With the 3.0 Ah rechargeable battery, you can clean up to 1000 sq feet in one go, for more efficient vacuuming.
Items delivered: 1 x Bosch Unlimited 7 cordless vacuum cleaner with 3.0 Ah rechargeable battery and docking station - in Graphite, 1 x FlexTube nozzle, 1 x 2-in-1 furniture brush & upholstery nozzle, 1 x Keyboard & drawer nozzle, 1 x crevice nozzle, 1 x mattress nozzle.

name: Philips PowerPro FC9352/01-Compact Bagless Vacuum Cleaner for Home |1900Watts for Powerful Suction |Compact and Lightweight| PowerCyclone 5 Technology and MultiClean Nozzle |2 Years Warranty
description:
1900-WATT DURABLE MOTOR: Durable 1900W motor generates up to 370W of high suction power for thorough cleaning results
POWERCYCLONE 5 TECHNOLOGY: PowerCyclone 5 technology accelerates the air flow in the cylindrical chamber to separate dust from the air and maintain high performance and strong suction power for longer
MULTICLEAN NOZZLE: MultiClean nozzle is designed to seal closely to the floor to ensure thorough cleaning across all floor types
HYGIENIC DUST DISPOSAL: Easy-to-empty dust container is designed for hygienic disposal with one hand, to help minimize dust cloud
COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Compact and lightweight design ensure both storing and carrying the vacuum is easy
INTEGRATED BRUSH: Dusting brush tool is built into the handle so it's always ready to use on furniture, flat surfaces and upholstery
ALLERGY H13 FILTER: The fully-sealed filtration system captures >99.9% of fine dust particles - including pollen, pet hair and dust mites - for allergy sufferers and anyone demanding a higher level of hygiene

description:
Philips OneBlade has a revolutionary technology designed for beard grooming. It can trim, Style and also shave any length of hair (Does not shave as close as manual razors as blade doesn't touch skin). OneBlade is powered by a turbo charged cutter (12000x per min) so it's efficient - even on longer hairs.
